sentences.en: Aim : To synthesize two kinds of amoxicillin artificial antigen.
sentences.cn: 目的: 制备阿莫西林完全抗原并鉴定.

sentences.en: AimTo synthesize ribonucleoside - incorporated oligonucleotides and investigate their binding abilities with complementary sequences.
sentences.cn: 目的合成异核苷掺入寡核苷酸并考察它们与互补序列的结合能力.

sentences.en: All the amino acids needed to synthesize protein are available in vegetables.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜能中和蛋白质食品消化过程中产生的酸性物质.

sentences.en: China was the first country in the world to synthesize crystalline insulin, a bioactive protein.
sentences.cn: 中国在世界上最早用人工方法合成一种有生物活力的蛋白质--结晶胰岛素.

sentences.en: DDT is a pesticide that was first synthesized in 1874.
sentences.cn: 滴滴涕是最初合成于1874年的杀虫剂。

sentences.en: Enucleate cytoplasm can still synthesize protein.
sentences.cn: 去核的细胞质仍然能合成蛋白质.

sentences.en: Etioplasts have the capacity to synthesize plastome - coded proteins.
sentences.cn: 黄化质体也有能力合成质体基因组所编码的蛋白质.

sentences.en: In fact , we use the digital way directly to synthesize sine wave.
sentences.cn: 摘要数字电路技术课程的知识难点是时序逻辑电路的设计.

sentences.en: Intermission process industry required to synthesize DCS and PLC.
sentences.cn: 而间歇过程工业,则需要dcs和 PLC的综合运用.而现在,这种情况发生了根本性的变化.

sentences.en: Many microorganisms synthesize and excrete compounds which are selectively toxic to other microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 许多微生物能合成并分泌一些对其它微生物具选择性毒力的化合物.

sentences.en: Objective : To synthesize oteracil and optimize the synthetic process.
sentences.cn: 目的: 合成奥特拉西并改进合成工艺.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To find a new way to synthesize scopoletin.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的设计东莨菪素合成的新工艺.

sentences.en: Objective To synthesize raloxifene hydrochloride, which is a selective estrogen receptor modulator.
sentences.cn: 目的合成选择性雌激素受体调节剂盐酸雷洛昔芬.

sentences.en: Once there is enough chi, one can readily synthesize the field.
sentences.cn: 一旦有足够的chi, 你就可以准备好来合成能量场.

sentences.en: The mechanism to synthesize the octyl - D - glucopyranoside catalyzed by zinc chloride is suggested.
sentences.cn: 报道了氯化锌催化合成正辛基 -D- 吡喃葡萄糖苷反应机理的研究,考察了影响产物构型的因素.

sentences.en: There are many amino acids that the body cannot synthesize itself.
sentences.cn: 有许多种氨基酸人体自身不能合成。

words.tran_cn: 综合，[化学] 合成；综合体

trans.tran_en: to make something by combining different things or substances

trans.tran_cn: 综合，人工合成，（通过化学手段或生物过程）合成，（音响）合成
trans.tran_en: to make something by combining different things or substances
